<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#espe" key="Spenser, Edmund">Spenser</rs> then--- <quote source="#">a little man with short hair,</quote></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">little group of readers. And that public began <del hand="ms">at once</del> <add hand="ms" place="above">at once</add> to</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">exert its pressure. What is the book that will please</l>
